message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the quality of this product is truly worth a bit more. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I can do $115, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
